name: They Watch From The Walls
description:
Every year parents send their children into the streets to get candy from strangers on Halloween night. Then they wait for them to come home.

...

Some of them never stop waiting.

In the indirect sequel to The Well Speaks To Me, Halloween's almost over, but you're not ready for the  fun to be stop just yet! When the mysterious Pumpkin Man offers you a free ticket to his haunted house attraction, how could you refuse? Charging in to win the surprise at the end, you start to realize that not everything is as it seems. Why are the doors disappearing? What does he mean by the noises? Could some of those awful decorations be real?

Features custom art, atmospheric storytelling and two different endings!
